AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: factory kitten
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef]'s father worked in one of the Grimalkin Dominion's many munitions factories, making grenades for the brave soldiers of the Grimalkin People's Liberation Army.\n\nAfter [PAWN_possessive] father bought a dummy grenade home to show [PAWN_objective], [PAWN_nameDef] began spending his free hours after school or studying helping out at the factory, where [PAWN_possessive] small paws made [PAWN_objective] very good at assembling and installing grenade fuzes.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: farm kitten
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] grew up on one of the Grimalkin Dominion's many collective farms in the countryside, where [PAWN_pronoun] attended school by day, and helped [PAWN_possessive] family in the rice paddies in the afternoon.\n\nInspired by army convoys passing the fields daily, [PAWN_pronoun] vowed to join the Grimalkin People's Liberation Army when [PAWN_pronoun] grew up.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: miner's kitten
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef]'s parents toiled in one of the Grimalkin Dominion's many mines, extracting coking coal used in the nation's steelworking and munitions manufacturing industries. After school, [PAWN_pronoun] would help grade and sort coal lumps coming off the conveyor.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Young Pioneer
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.description: After giving a well-received speech at school on the principles and values of The Great Feline Revolution, [PAWN_nameDef] was awarded a red scarf, and nominated by [PAWN_possessive] teacher to become a Young Pioneer, leading [PAWN_possessive] classmates by example to dedicate their lives to the glory of the Grimalkin Dominion.\n\n[PAWN_pronoun] took additional political classes after school, and organized community volunteer activities such as collecting scrap metal for the country's military factories.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: rifleman
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] trained as a rifleman in the Grimalkin People's Liberation Army, and was often deployed on military operations to secure the Grimalkin Dominion's borders from trespassing Mousekins.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: machine gunner
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] served in the Grimalkin People's Liberation Army as a squad machine gunner, laying down suppressive fire to help [PAWN_possessive] comrades advance in the field of battle.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: grenadier
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] served in the Grimalkin People's Liberation Army as a squad grenadier, flushing out Mousekins hiding behind cover with indirect fire from [PAWN_possessive] grenade launcher.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: sniper
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] trained as a sniper in the Grimalkin People's Liberation Army, operating either alone, paired with another sniper/spotter, or attached to an infantry squad.\n\n[PAWN_pronoun] was skilled enough to shoot the ears off a Mousekin over five hundred meters away.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: vehicle crewman
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] operated various armored vehicles in the Grimalkin People's Liberation Army, ranging from light scout cars to infantry fighting vehicles and main battle tanks.\n\n[PAWN_pronoun] and [PAWN_possessive] fellow crewmen liked to run betting pools to see who can squash the most Mousekin peasants with their vehicles' wheels and tracked treads.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: stormtrooper
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] displayed zealous ferocity during basic training, and was seconded by [PAWN_possessive] drill sergeant to the Stormtrooper Corps.\n\nAfter many months of grueling training, [PAWN_pronoun] was soon leading [PAWN_possessive] fellow stormtroopers and dozens of regular army infantrymen in assaulting trenches and overwhelming enemy defenses, [PAWN_possessive] combat prowess matched only by [PAWN_possessive] insatiable bloodlust for hapless Mousekins.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: staff officer
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] served as a staff officer in the Grimalkin People's Liberation Army, performing clerical, logistics and other administrative work within the safe confines of Grimalkin Dominion military bases.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: colonel
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] began his career in the Grimalkin People's Liberation Army as a lowly rifleman, whose frequent demonstrations of valor in battle and loyalty to the Fatherland earned [PAWN_objective] a much-coveted letter of recommendation to the prestigious Officers' Academy.\n\nAfter graduating as a First Lieutenant and being welcomed back to [PAWN_possessive] old unit as a platoon leader, [PAWN_pronoun] gradually worked [PAWN_possessive] way up the ranks until [PAWN_pronoun] eventually took command of the entire regiment after [PAWN_possessive] mentor and sponsor retired.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Grand Marshal
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.description: Through many decades of valorous service and demonstrated loyalty to the Fatherland, [PAWN_nameDef] rose through the ranks to be appointed as a general in the Central Military Commission, the supreme authority of the Grimalkin People's Liberation Army and the Grimalkin Dominion as a whole, and was later groomed by the previous Grand Marshal to eventually succeed him.
